response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a price slightly above its intrinsic worth of $800,000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing a remarkable deal while also contributing to our mutual success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
